name: Chicken Malai Boti Tikka Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Chicken Malai Boti Tikka Recipe: Chicken Boneless ½ kg cut in 1 inch cubes Green Chilies Paste 1 tbsp Mint leaves (grindede) 6 Coriander Leaves (grinded)1 tbsp Papaya (grinded with skin) 1 tbsp Ginger Garlic Paste 1 tbsp Salt 1 tsp Cream 4 tbsp Lemon Juice ¼ cup Yoghurt 3 tbsp White Pepper 1/2 tsp
instructions: Marinate chicken with all the given ingredients Put on skewers grill in 2 tbsp oil in fry pan Give dum of coal serve with naan.
